why_us.WHY_US_TEXT: We transform complex business challenges into elegant software solutions that drive measurable ROI. Our Fortune 500-caliber development team delivers enterprise-grade applications that reduce operational costs by up to 40%, accelerate time-to-market, and scale seamlessly with your growth. When you partner with CodeNovex, you're not just getting code - you're gaining a strategic technology partner committed to your long-term success.
why_us.PRICING_TEXT: Our fixed-price project model eliminates budget uncertainty. You'll receive a detailed proposal with clear milestones, deliverables, and ROI projections before any commitment. Most clients see positive returns within 6-12 months of launch.
why_us.PRICING_BOX: We stay ahead of the technology curve so your business stays competitive. Our continuous R&D investment means you benefit from cutting-edge solutions like AI integration, blockchain security, and cloud-native architecture - without the enterprise price tag.

team.WHO_WE_ARE_TEXT: We are a diverse and dedicated team of developers, designers, and tech enthusiasts united by our passion for innovation and our commitment to excellence. With a deep understanding of cutting-edge technologies and a collaborative approach to problem-solving, we strive to create bespoke software solutions that not only meet but exceed the unique needs and expectations of our clients. Our journey is defined by a relentless pursuit of quality, creativity, and customer satisfaction, as we continue to push the boundaries of possibility and shape the digital landscape one project at a time.

services.WHAT_WE_DO_TEXT: Enterprise-Grade Software Solutions That Drive Revenue Growth & Operational Excellence
services.WEB3: Build decentralized applications (dApps) and blockchain solutions that enhance security, reduce transaction costs, and create new revenue streams. Perfect for fintech, supply chain, and digital asset businesses.
services.UI/UX: Increase conversion rates by up to 200% with data-driven interface design. Our UX research identifies friction points and optimizes user flows to maximize engagement and customer lifetime value.
services.FRONT_END: Lightning-fast, mobile-responsive interfaces that load in under 2 seconds. Built with React, Vue, or Angular to deliver app-like experiences that keep users engaged and reduce bounce rates.
services.BACK_END: Scalable server architecture that handles millions of requests without breaking. Our microservices approach ensures 99.9% uptime, seamless third-party integrations, and effortless scaling as your user base grows.
services.SEO: Dominate search rankings and multiply organic traffic. Our technical SEO strategies have helped clients achieve first-page Google rankings for competitive keywords, driving 300%+ increases in qualified leads.

contactForm.HEADING: Let's Build Something Amazing Together
contactForm.SUBHEADING: Tell us about your project and we'll get back to you within 24 hours with a detailed proposal.
contactForm.MESSAGE_PLACEHOLDER: Tell us about your project requirements...
contactForm.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. We'll contact you within 24 hours.
contactForm.ERROR_MESSAGE: An error occurred. Please try again or email us directly at info@codenovex.ge
contactForm.PRIVACY_TEXT: We respect your privacy. Your information will never be shared with third parties.

footer.FOOTER_TEXT: Ready to scale your business with custom software? Let's discuss your project and provide a detailed roadmap to success.
